isis.stitle: SINGLE REDUCTION, TANDEM DRIVE AXLES: EATON - LUBRICATION

svcproc.title: APPROVED LUBRICANTS
svcproc.para: General: Gear lubrications acceptable under military specification MIL-L-2105D are approved for use in Eaton Drive Axles. The MIL-L-2105D specification defines performance and viscosity requirements for multigrade oils. Refer to GROUP 10 - LUBRICATION in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for recommended lubes.

note.para: The use of separate oil additives and/or friction modifiers are not approved in Eaton Drive Axles.

svcproc.para: Synthetic-based: Synthetic-based gear lubricants exhibit superior thermal and oxidation stability, and generally degrade at a lower rate when compared to petroleum-based lubricants.
Make-up lube: Maximum amount of non-synthetic make-up lube is 10%.
